Text.value: The multipurpose In-/Out can be used as extra SIO, for Switching Count Supervision and as teach in.

Our standard inductive sensors are ideal for object detection in metal areas. They are short-circuit protected and operate without contact, making them wear-free and very resistant to dirt and contamination. The sensors are available in configurations from 3 mm dia. to 80x80 mm square dimensions.
Switching Count Supervision: Speed is too low.
Switching Count Supervision: Speed is too high.
Switching Count Supervision: Count limit / Speed is o.k.
Describes the function of the device.
Describes the location of the device.
Addresses the switching channel for the next teach commands.
Shows the actual state of teach in.
Setpoint values of the SSC. Interpreted in the same way as the proximity values
Sets switchpoint-logic, -mode (hysteresis can not be set)
Operating hours since last power up.
Counts completed hours since liftime, maintenace and power up.
Lifetime boot cycles of the sensor.
Sets outdriver type PNP,NPN or Push Pull for C/Q in SIO mode and DO. It's although possible to disable the output driver. (CQ only in SIO Mode.)
Sets outdriver function normaly open or closed for C/Q in SIO mode and DO.
Switch Counter Upper Limit High threshold
Switch Counter Upper Limit Low threshold
Switch Counter Lower Limit High threshold
Switch Counter Lower Limit Low threshold
Current status information of the switching count feature.
Sets the debounce time for physical inputs, this value is only used if the PIN is configured as digital input.
Selects the function of an I/O pin.
